title: For Trade: T206 Wheat w/ Tolstoi overprint
author: vintage

posts.post_title: For Trade: T206 Wheat w/ Tolstoi overprint
posts.post_content:
I have a T206 Wheat w/Tolstoi overprint I'd like to trade.  I'm looking for HOF'er portraits and specifically for Christy Mathewson portrait. Condition is not a factor, I love beaters.  Can also throw in some cash on a trade.

The overprint is light on this card
